title: Young Master, Come and Possess Me! - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Historical   Mature   Mystery   Romance   Smut   Supernatural
tags: Ancient China   Ancient Times   Beasts   Body Swap   Fantasy Creatures   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Fox Spirits
author: 七月晴
description:
Tang Cheng Cheng is the sole breadwinner of the family. After almost drowning in the lake, she woke up and everyone started to treat her with fear and respect. A familiar girl sat in front of her. 

Oh My God, why is she looking at HERSELF? 

'My son, are you alright?' Young Master Li's mother said to her. This cannot be true... How can she turn into YOUNG MASTER LI??? Why is Young Master Li a demon fox???

After the soul exchange, Master Demon Fox lost all his mana. He said that he could only recover his mana by sleeping with me? Is he kidding me, I will protect my body so that he doesn't take away my virginity!! Damn it... why does the master have so many enemies?! I'm going to die.

Master, come on quick and possess me!!
>
